rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
突破性研究揭示了如何靶向侵袭性癌症中的恶性DNA科学家们发现了一种方法，可以靶向难以捉摸的环状 DNA 片段，从而促进一些最具侵袭性的癌症的存活，为未来的治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Breakthrough-research-reveals-how-to-target-malignant-DNA-in-aggressive-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Breakthrough-research-reveals-how-to-target-malignant-DNA-in-aggressive-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ca02e16-f420-458e-895a-8adc559ab6fe Sat, 09 Nov 2024 05:10:00 -0500 Breakthrough research reveals how to target malignant DNA in aggressive cancers
农药接触与前列腺癌的发病率和死亡率有关研究人员在美国发现了 22 种农药与前列腺癌的发病率始终相关，其中 4 种农药还与前列腺癌死亡率相关。该研究结果由 Wiley 在线发表在美国癌症协会同行评审期刊《CANCER》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Pesticide-exposure-linked-to-prostate-cancer-incidence-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Pesticide-exposure-linked-to-prostate-cancer-incidence-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ba37e38-1e32-4c9d-874d-e1ed460e27ff Sat, 09 Nov 2024 05:05:00 -0500 Pesticide exposure linked to prostate cancer incidence and mortality
研究揭示了儿童如何培养对单词的理解一项独特的研究为幼儿如何开始理解单词的含义提供了令人着迷的新线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Research-reveals-how-children-develop-understanding-of-words.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Research-reveals-how-children-develop-understanding-of-words.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe78c2cf-dd46-49ff-8380-b87e46c9b102 Sat, 09 Nov 2024 05:02:00 -0500 Research reveals how children develop understanding of words
新型膀胱癌治疗方法在英国获得 MHRA 批准强生公司宣布，药品和保健品监管局 (MHRA) 已授予 BALVERSA®▼ (erdafitinib) 的营销授权，作为治疗成人不可切除或转移性尿路上皮癌 (UC) 的单一疗法，UC 是最常见的癌症形式膀胱癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Novel-bladder-cancer-treatment-gains-MHRA-approval-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/Novel-bladder-cancer-treatment-gains-MHRA-approval-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=839bc527-4ad7-4ecb-859e-d1ee0d12b591 Sat, 09 Nov 2024 04:58:00 -0500 Novel bladder cancer treatment gains MHRA approval in the UK
新数据地图凸显了英国各地儿童心理健康的差异心理健康中心与库斯合作制作的新数据地图揭示了英国四个国家以及当地地区之间儿童和青少年心理健康的巨大差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/New-data-map-highlights-disparities-in-childrene28099s-mental-health-across-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241109/New-data-map-highlights-disparities-in-childrene28099s-mental-health-across-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d7417b3-a001-4ccf-9fb0-fa6d44afd997 Sat, 09 Nov 2024 04:54:00 -0500 New data map highlights disparities in children’s mental health across the UK
克利夫兰诊所公布三阴性乳腺癌疫苗的新发现克利夫兰诊所的研究人员公布了他们的新疫苗研究的最新结果，该疫苗旨在预防三阴性乳腺癌，这是一种最具侵袭性和致命性的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Cleveland-Clinic-presents-new-findings-on-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Cleveland-Clinic-presents-new-findings-on-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d524dbf-3384-415c-a463-c64aede119dd Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:46:54 -0500 Cleveland Clinic presents new findings on triple-negative breast cancer vaccine
HMGB1 作为肝病发病机制的关键介质由于高发病率和死亡率，急性和慢性肝病继续构成重大的临床挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/HMGB1-as-a-key-mediator-in-liver-disease-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/HMGB1-as-a-key-mediator-in-liver-disease-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d07ff36-2c35-41e1-bdcb-a5a8c47cdc89 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:35:30 -0500 HMGB1 as a key mediator in liver disease pathogenesis
研究表明 COVID-19 期间的公众批评如何影响教师的福祉研究显示，在 COVID-19 封锁期间，公众对教师“重返校园”施加了巨大的压力，这加深了一种已经普遍存在的教师被低估的感觉，并让一些教师积极重新思考自己的职业生涯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Research-shows-how-public-criticism-during-COVID-19-impacted-teacher-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Research-shows-how-public-criticism-during-COVID-19-impacted-teacher-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a77ddbd-42fb-4ddf-914b-58d569072054 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:08:11 -0500 Research shows how public criticism during COVID-19 impacted teacher wellbeing
新方法重振疲惫的 T 细胞以改善肿瘤控制随着癌细胞的生长，它们会将乳酸等代谢副产物泵入肿瘤微环境中。耗尽的 T 细胞 -;已经失去了抗癌功效——；根据匹兹堡大学和 UPMC 希尔曼癌症中心的最新研究，人体会消耗这种乳酸，从而进一步消耗能量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-approach-reinvigorates-exhausted-T-cells-to-improve-tumor-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-approach-reinvigorates-exhausted-T-cells-to-improve-tumor-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d4b7302-514d-42f5-b5a7-d88bf7171c65 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:05:47 -0500 New approach reinvigorates exhausted T cells to improve tumor control
狼疮研究联盟推出首个转化桥梁奖以加速狼疮治疗狼疮研究联盟 (LRA) 很高兴地宣布首届转化桥梁奖 (TBA) 获得者，该奖项于今年设立，旨在加速将突破性研究转化为狼疮的潜在治疗和诊断方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Lupus-Research-Alliance-launches-first-Translational-Bridge-Award-to-accelerate-lupus-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Lupus-Research-Alliance-launches-first-Translational-Bridge-Award-to-accelerate-lupus-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db4ecbd5-c8d4-42b3-8349-5fb344eac760 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 22:04:03 -0500 Lupus Research Alliance launches first Translational Bridge Award to accelerate lupus treatments
